## rgamer のインストール方法

```{r, eval = FALSE}
installed.packages("remotes")
```

```{r, eval = FALSE}
remotes::install_github("yukiyanai/rgamer")
```


## 使用方法

```{r, eval = TRUE}
library(rgamer)
```


試しに

```{r}
g <- normal_form(
  players = c("player 1", "player 2"), 
  s1 = c("C", "D"), 
  s2 = c("C", "D"),   
  payoffs1 =c(4, 5, 1, 2),
  payoffs2 =c(4, 1, 5, 2),
)
```


利得表を見せる
```{r, results='asis'}
g_sol <- solve_nfg(g)
```

NE を表示!

```{r}
g_sol$psNE
```
